tech_news.title: The first features from our cutest drop yet - Minecraft
tech_news.description: Baby farm mobs are first to waddle into Minecraft with a whole new look. Befriend these tiny rascals, hear their sweet sounds, and craft them name tags in Java snapshot and Bedrock beta/preview!

tech_news.title: EXCLUSIVE: Hollywood Legend Jeff Bridges Lists Malibu Land for $4.4 Million—After Beloved Family Home Burned in Wildfires - Yahoo
tech_news.description: Bridges' longtime Malibu home, which was passed to him by his parents, was destroyed in the California wildfires.

tech_news.title: LEGO Says Smart Brick Is 'Here to Stay,' and Responds to 'Questions and Concerns' Around Abandoning Non-Digital Play - IGN
tech_news.description: A day on from the official reveal of LEGO Smart Brick, the company has responded to concerns that its big announcement poses a risk to its core basis in physical play.

tech_news.title: Locked Fallout TV Show Countdown Timer Coincides With Season 2 Finale — but Fans Are Hoping It Also Signals a Fallout 3 or New Vegas Remaster Shadowdrop - IGN
tech_news.description: There is a mysterious countdown timer on Amazon’s official website for its Fallout TV series that is set to unlock when the Season 2 finale comes out — but fans think it might also signal the shadowdrop of a Fallout 3 or New Vegas remaster.

tech_news.title: Introducing Flame Rifle - Hunt: Showdown
tech_news.description: Hunt: Showdown is a competitive first-person PvP bounty hunting game with heavy PvE elements. Set in the darkest corners of the world, Hunt packs the thrill of survival games into a match-based format.

tech_news.title: 500 Worlds: Titus – Strike fast and hold the line with new Space Marines Detachments - Warhammer Community
tech_news.description: Fill the sky with Drop Pods!

tech_news.title: The Clicks Communicator phone is made specifically for messaging - Dezeen
tech_news.description: UK-based company Clicks Technology has followed up its Blackberry-like keyboard accessory for smartphones with the Clicks Communicator, a phone built for messaging, launched at this week's Consumer Electronics Show.

tech_news.title: Google’s Koray Kavukcuoglu: Turning abstract AI thinking into user-friendly products - Financial Times
tech_news.description: The tech giant’s chief AI architect and CTO of DeepMind discusses the Gemini 3 LLM and progress towards the goal of artificial general intelligence

tech_news.description: Nikon has announced the Nikkor Z 24-105mm f/4-7.1 zoom lens for Nikon full-frame mirrorless cameras.
